data.description: Fall 2026 - IEF - Software Engineering Collegiate Associate Intern in GAC Savannah Unique Skills: Your Future Takes Flight at Gulfstream At Gulfstream, a proud division of General Dynamics, Collegiate Associates apply classroom learning to real-world challenges and gain valuable experience. You’ll work alongside skilled professionals in a culture built on integrity, pride, and excellence—preparing you for future success in the aerospace industry. Our corporate headquarters in Savannah, Georgia provides the ideal setting for your associate experience by combining professional opportunity with the charm of a historic coastal city. What You’ll Experience Real-world projects that make an impact Exposure to innovative practices Opportunities to build skills and professional connections About the position Gulfstream engineering interns in Innovation, Engineering and Flight are an integral part of the engineering staff, contributing to projects that are both technically challenging and educationally stimulating. We are looking for all levels of educational experience —from undergraduates to master's and PhD students—who are seeking professional experience in a state-of-the-art engineering environment. If you are looking to gain professional experience and are passionate about aviation and engineering, you will be intrigued by the opportunities we give interns across almost 40 different departments that support Innovation, Engineering, and Flight. Over the course of our internship experience you will have the opportunity to: Work directly with a team in your field of study to develop solutions for real-world challenges. Experience our products up close by touring our state-of-the-art manufacturing and research facilities. Interact directly with our company leaders to learn about the future of Gulfstream. Build a lasting professional network through social events and engaging activities. Accelerate your professional experience through gaining the skills and knowledge to become a future leader in the aerospace industry. Engineering departments you may be considered for: Application & Data Systems Lab Test & Software Engineering Education Requirement Must be currently enrolled in an accredited university pursuing a bachelor’s degree or higher in one of the following disciplines: Electrical Engineering Computer Engineering Software Engineering Computer Science Benefits Include Competitive pay Paid Time Off Housing stipend (if your permanent residence is more than 50 miles from Gulfstream) Medical coverage 401(k) match Collegiate networking event Please note that this job description may remain active until March 27, 2026. Interviews may be conducted before or after this date. Education and Experience Requirements Position Purpose:Start your journey today by joining our team for a career-building experience that utilizes your skills within a world-class organization.Job Description Principle Duties and Responsibilities:Essential Functions: Perform other duties as assigned.Other Requirements: Enrolled as a full-time student at time of application, actively pursuing a bachelor’s degree or above. Complete their freshman year by the time the internship starts. Cumulative GPA of 3.0 (without rounding); must be listed on resume. Minimum 12-14 week requirement (summer); 14-16 week requirement (spring and fall). Must be onsite; this is not a remote position. Must have reliable transportation. Additional Information Requisition Number: 230282 Posting Type: Internal-External Department: J1694-IEF College Interns Category: Other Percentage of Travel: Up to 25% Shift: First Employment Type: Collegiate Associate Salary Grade:N3 Number of Openings: 1 Equal Opportunity Employer / Individuals with Disabilities / Protected Veterans Gulfstream does not provide work visa sponsorship for this position, unless the applicant is a currently sponsored Gulfstream employee. Gulfstream Aerospace Corporation, a wholly-owned subsidiary of General Dynamics (NYSE: GD), designs, develops, manufactures, markets, services and supports the world's most technologically-advanced business jet aircraft
